house_listing.house_description: Beautiful inventory home features huge kitchen, 5 bedrooms, formal living/dining & spacious family room. This home has it all. Raised panel oak cabinets, garden tub, seperate shower in master, hardwood foyer, gas fireplace are a few of the custom features.
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Breakfast Room, Cable TV, Foyer, Utility Room, Walk-In Closet(s)
